resources.string: It\'s an app where you choose foods from available registered restaurants and cafes adding them to your basket. Upon successful payment for the basket, your food is packed for delivery by our delivery services. The app is integrated with Safaricom daraja lipa-na-mpesa online (paybill) for paying the basket. Africa\'s Talking SMS API for communicating or updates to the customers individually or bulky. Google Maps for easier choose of restaurants registered on the map and tracking between the delivery guy\'s location and your location.
